readme:
# atom-sonic-pi package

Wrap your code selection in HTML/XML tags


### How to use

This package lets you surround your code selections with `<...></...>` tags, assuming you want to insert a break after the opening and before the closing tag. More precisely, it assumes you want to transform

```
This must be the best day of your life, Morty. You get to be the maaayyyyooorrr of I-told-you-town.
```

into

```
<quote>
	This must be the best day of your life, Morty. You get to be the maaayyyyooorrr of I-told-you-town.
</quote>
```


## License

This code is free to use under the terms of the MIT license.
